name: Wormhole (daves84)
description:
Navigate through the wormhole, collect yellow circles for points, green circles for lives, and avoid red circles at all costs! What's the highest score you can get? Every circle encountered increases the speed at which you are travelling through the wormhole.

Created for TriJam #135 - 3 hour game jam! All assets and music created by me, except the built in font.
